general information

Eren Batuhan Es is a product‑minded builder who enjoys turning brittle workflows into robust automation. He is the founder and product lead of Sartor, an AI‑assisted testing suite built on Google Cloud. As a research assistant on the Industry Evolution Project, he created an OCR/computer‑vision pipeline with OpenAI that compressed months of manual data extraction into hours. Earlier at Sertifier, he shipped ETL pipelines and dashboards that powered real‑time analytics and reduced marketing costs. Eren earned a BSc in Economics, Management & Computer Science at Bocconi and is now completing the MSc in Economics & Management of Innovation and Technology. He co‑founded Bocconi Students for Statistics and Data Science, placed 2nd in the CEU Social Data Science Hackathon (predictive modeling on blockchain transactions), and when not at a keyboard he’s likely bouldering or learning more about cinematography.
